title: Onboarding Questionnaire Schema
description: Schema for onboarding questionnaire with questions and multiple choice options

questionItem.title: Question Item
questionItem.description: A single question with multiple choice options

id.title: Question ID
id.description: A short, unique identifier for the question (e.g., 'workflow', 'measurement_points')

question.title: Question Text
question.description: The main question prompt text displayed to the user
examples: What does your current blade‑inspection workflow look like?
How many measurement points does your blade usually require?
Do you compare live measurements directly against CAD tolerances?

options.title: Answer Options
options.description: Array of multiple choice answer options for the question

items.title: Option Text
examples: Fully automated: robot arm + integrated camera & calipers
